review: So much hope and anticipation at first but I rarely use it now.  Haven't played a game on it since the first week I had this (and I even got the game controller).  Hard to find just the movie or show you want to watch from the tens of thousands of programs available.  I do use it sometimes to put up a mirror image on the big screen TV of what I am watching on the Kindle tablet.  That's a neat feature.  But I don't really use my Kindle tablet anymore.

review: Good product.  Seems to load/buffer streams faster than other streaming devices and sticks. Quality of video and sound is great,  especially using the optical audio out.  I like all of the options but wish there was some more customization.  I figure getting the TV over the stick,  that there would be more features for double the price.  The remote is a little touchy and it's not very fluid when cycling through videos no matter which app you are in, feels a little choppy. All in all I am happy with the product,  maybe some updates will help the GUI
